comment.author: 20545036@N00
comment._content: Investigations shows that she's probably from the Norwegian region of Sápmi, land of The sami people, from the village of Guovdageaidnu (Kautokeino) and that her name was Kirsten Bals.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Wow!  I'm so happy to hear her (likely) name. Thank you.

comment.author: 20545036@N00
comment._content: Penny: It was recently that  a journalist managed to find out with some help from people of the local community, if I'm right, who she was. She head for Alaska, after that she disappeared.
